scripts.build: npm run build:headless && npm run build:lib && npm run build:demo && npm run build:tsc
scripts.build:headless: node ../scripts/rm.js dist/headless && tsc -p tsconfig.headless.json && node ../scripts/buildPackageJson.js headless dist/headless
scripts.build:lib: node ../scripts/rm.js dist/lib && tsc -p tsconfig.lib.json && node ../scripts/buildPackageJson.js lib dist/lib
